entities.name: ticket box
entities.description: The entity is described as something that can be smashed into. It is likely a container or enclosure for tickets.

entities.name: trolley
entities.description: The entity is described as a vehicle used to transport things, and the person is leaning forward on it.

relationships.description: The person is going to smash into the ticket box, indicating that the ticket box is the target of their action.
The person is leaning forward on the trolley, indicating a physical relationship between them.
